snippet: The Manhattan School of Music’s Symphonic Chorus and Chamber Choir performed Stravinsky’s Mass and Honegger’s “King David” on Friday evening.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews concert of Stravinsky works performed by Manhattan School of Music's Symphonic Chorus and Chamber Choir at Manhattan School of Music.
lead_paragraph: The Manhattan School of Music’s Symphonic Chorus and Chamber Choir performed Stravinsky’s Mass and Honegger’s “King David” on Friday evening.

headline.seo: Manhattan School of Music in ‘King David’ and Stravinsky’s Mass
headline.main: Heroic Figures From the Bible, Writ Large and Sparely
headline.print_headline: Heroic Figures From the Bible, Writ Large and Sparely
